title: I Miss The SG Log In Already
body:
I miss the music from the Star Guardian log in. 
Get outta here Ivern!

replies.body: There is always the [youtube version](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6kEZEvMYKQY&index=1&list=PLbAFXJC0J5GZHUtGea_zQR0OyD3UBuw9s) in all of its full, login window-less glory to tide you over!

The SG login files are still present in your client - just delete (or backup) the Ivern one, and you have your SG login back.

Personally, I switched to the Japanese SG song - much more fitting.

Though, lets not forget:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6EM-D9NEb9o

Get LoLReplay. You can change the login screen extremely easily from there.
... not to mention, replays just in case you want to watch that epic pentakill you might get one day.
